title: DJ Real P gives us a crash course on sampling
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In the first installment of our new music series, "Sample This," Boston Music Award-winner DJ Real P gives us a crash course on sampling, teaching us how artists use one song to make another.
itunes:author: WBUR
